list.name: Changes
list.comment: Minor changes before cleanup - intending to remove redundant ExperimentPaperUAS.java

list.name: Changes to accelerate large graph learning tests
list.comment: Halved the time it takes to run TestLearnerFromLargePTA. The reason it was taking hours is because during refactoring a long time ago I removed a condition to run extra checks only for a small matrix. Running them for a large matrix takes a while but it is reasonable to run them hence halving the time they run is good news.

item.itemvalue: JUnit.Run All tests with old OTP

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Changes to accelerate large graph learning tests

task.summary: split modified_typer into modular (as was used in old Debian distribution) and monolithic (current distribution of typer).
Started to adapt dialyzer-4.4.4 to Statechum - need to do it in steps so that changes can be applied to subsequent versions of dialyzer
Migration to newer OTP continuing, a lot of work still pending.
Added a simple parser for DOT file format.
Early Dec 2022 updates - minor changes plus some OTP migration
Added parser and dumper for Erlang maps
Initial edition of MapSignature and minor improvements to modified typer.
Revised the version of typer so that one of the tests using typer now passes on Erlang 24.
Removed unused seekUsages
Erlang Module tests now pass in Erlang Otp 24.
More Erlang tests pass, many Synapse tests still fail.
All current Erlang tests pass with OpenJDK and OTP 24.
Merged experimental branch into main and resolved conflicts to make sure that the outcome builds. Running tests is next task.
Fast tests pass.
Updated to run on JDK 8. Fast tests pass.
Moved Harmony to separate directory, currently using old collections. All (including lengthy) tests pass.
Misc cleanup

Halved the time it takes to run TestLearnerFromLargePTA. The reason it was taking hours is because during refactoring a long time ago I removed a condition to run extra checks only for a small matrix. Running them for a large matrix takes a while but it is reasonable to run them hence halving the time they run is good news.
Builds with new umfpack and passes tests.
Modernised a number of experiments. Commented out part of HandleLowLevelFunction that was both broken and not covered by tests.
Minor changes, functionality almost identical but documentation improved.
Minor changes before cleanup - intending to remove redundant ExperimentPaperUAS.java

MESSAGE.value: Early Dec 2022 updates - minor changes plus some OTP migration
Added parser and dumper for Erlang maps
Initial edition of MapSignature and minor improvements to modified typer.
Revised the version of typer so that one of the tests using typer now passes on Erlang 24.
Removed unused seekUsages
Erlang Module tests now pass in Erlang 24.
Erlang Module tests now pass in Erlang Otp 24.
More Erlang tests pass, many Synapse tests still fail.
All current Erlang tests pass with OpenJDK and OTP 24.
Added tests for typer's handling of map types and another test for record type (which is the same as a tuple).
Merged experimental branch into main and resolved conflicts. Running tests is next task.
Merged experimental branch into main and resolved conflicts to make sure that the outcome builds. Running tests is next task.
Fast tests pass.
Updated to run on JDK 8. Fast tests pass.
Erlang tests now run with both new and old OTP which required separating parts of Statechum into a separate library.

Renamed ParameterizedWithName's package to junit_runners in order for it to be different to JUnit's since when running under Eclipse it causes security error given that JUnit package is signed and ParameterizedWithName is not. In addition, made sure that construction of vertices does not pass an existing vertex to DeterministicVertex as an ID - even a single attempt to compareTo between DeterministicVertex with StringVertex as ID and another ID appears to reduce the performance of subsequent computations by around 10%.

Renamed ParameterizedWithName's package to junit_runners in order for it to be different to JUnit's since when running under Eclipse it causes security error given that JUnit package is signed and ParameterizedWithName is not. In addition, made sure that construction of vertices does not pass an existing vertex to DeterministicVertex as an ID - even a single attempt to compareTo between DeterministicVertex with StringVertex as ID and another ID appears to reduce the performance of subsequent computations by around 10%. Miscellaneous cleanup.
Moved Harmony to separate directory, currently using old collections. All (including lengthy) tests pass.
Misc cleanup

Halved the time it takes to run TestLearnerFromLargePTA. The reason it was taking hours is because during refactoring a long time ago I removed a condition to run extra checks only for a small matrix. Running them for a large matrix takes a while but it is reasonable to run them hence halving the time they run is good news.

Corrected a couple of tests - they were failing due to the conversion from string names to vertex numbers. Previously this was not noticable but now I'm using array-based collections in checkM so such things stand out.
Builds with new umfpack and passes tests.
Modernised a number of experiments. Commented out part of HandleLowLevelFunction that was both broken and not covered by tests.
Minor changes, functionality almost identical but documentation improved.
Minor changes before cleanup - intending to remove redundant ExperimentPaperUAS.java

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Minor changes before cleanup - intending to remove redundant ExperimentPaperUAS.java
